// An admonition that uses the same block syntax:
== Section title

[NOTE]
====
An admonition.
====

[TIP]
====
An admonition.
====

[IMPORTANT]
====
An admonition.
====

[WARNING]
====
An admonition.
====

[CAUTION]
====
An admonition.
====

.An admonition title
[NOTE]
====
An admonition.
====

[NOTE]
.An admonition title
====
An admonition.
====

[NOTE]


====
An admonition.
====

. A step.
+

+
====
An admonition.
====

. A step.
